PHAM QUANG SON
ASP.NET DEVELOPER
78/22/39 Ton That Thuyet, Ward 16,
District 4 TP.HCM, Vietnam
phamquangson1994@gmail.com
0775094178
OBJECTIVE
I am young, working with ASP.NET, always want to develop myself by learning new technologies and challenging
myself.
So I hope you will reconsider my application and give me a chance to work with your company.
WILLING TO ABSORB , LEARN FROM EXPERIENCE, RESPONSIBILITY AND FRIENDLY
WORK EXPERIENCE
BEYOND ENDGE COMPANY
ASP.NET DEVELOPER
FEBRUARY 2018 - NOW
- Position: .NET Developer.
- Products: SmartMES, MCEmployee, SCDF, TheCompanyPlatform.
     + SmartMES: Major project, using ASP.NET MVC, LinQ, MySql, Code
First, Entity Framework, Kendo (Scheduler), Html, Css, Bootstrap,
Javascript, Jquery, Json.
     + MCEmployee: Maintain, using ASP.NET MVC, LinQ, SQL Server,
Database First, Entity Core, Html, Css, Bootstrap, Javascript, Jquery.
     + SCDF, TheCompanyPlatform: support FrontEnd-make 1 page for
each project: using .NET Core 2.0, LinQ, SQL Server, Code First, Entity
Core, Html, Css, Bootstrap, Javascript, Jquery, 
K.SOLUTION COMPANY
ASP.NET DEVELOPER
APRIL 2017 - OCT 2017
- Position: .NET Developer.
- Products: MRP DANU Vina.
- Using:  ASP.NET MVC, LinQ, SQL Server, Stored procedure, Database
First, Entity Framework, Kendo (Grid), Javascript, Jquery, Json,.
THUMBSUP COMPANY
ASP.NET DEVELOPER
JANUARY 2016 - JANUARY 2017
- Position: .NET Developer and Phonegap App.
- Web Products: ufllvietnam.com, fcstonesvn.com, errandboy.ferya.org.
- Apps: Adsplus, Newis.
- Using: ASP.NET Web Form, LinQ, SQL Server Html, Css, Javascript,
Jquery, Bootstrap, 
SELF DEVELOPMENT
- I learned about React, Redux from 8th to 12th January 2018 and
understand the basics of it.
- I learned about Golang language for 3 weeks in Oct 2017 and made
a website with basic functionality: CRUD (using: Html, Css, Javascript,
Jquery, Golang, MySql).
GENERAL KNOWLEDGE
 - SOLID principles
 - Repository pattern
 - Unit of Work pattern
 - OOP
OTHER SKILLS
- English: writing, reading
CAOTHANG TECHNICAL COLLEGES
OCT 2013
MAJOR: INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY
EDUCATION
